Container.Name: MovieGrabber
Container.Description: MovieGrabber is a fully automated way of downloading movie from usenet.[br]Supporting any nzb client that has a "watched" or "monitor" folder like Sabnzbd+, Grabit, Newsbin.[br]MovieGrabber works by checking imdb for matching criteria and if a match is found the nzb will be place in a specified folder for user review or sent to the watched folder for processing and automatic downloading via your usenet binary client.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where moviegrabber will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/watchfolder[/b] Watch-folder location for your client of choice[br] [b]/movies[/b] Where your movies are.[br]
